item.title: Hello World, The Infrastructure Guy
item.description: Objective The objective of this post is to build a website using Hugo and Github Pages. Steps Create a Github account if you do not have one Create a Github Repository Go through Hugo’s Quickstart Guide Go though Hugo on Github Make sure you delete public folder and add a .gitignore file. Set up Github Action workflow Make sure you enable ’extended’ if your theme needs. Go through Github Pages, and Settings Profit Now, you can use your favorite Editor, e.
